message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR, cs.MM 

This paper is about 3D human pose estimation from a single image, which is a computer vision problem. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also introduces a new approach using Part-Centric Heatmap Triplets (HEMlets) and a Convolutional Network (ConvNet), which involves machine learning techniques. Hence, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are also likely sub-categories. The paper deals with skeletal body parts and joint-heatmaps, which are related to graphics and visualization, making cs.GR (Computer Graphics) a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper involves volumetric joint-heatmap regression, which is related to multimedia, making cs.MM (Multimedia) a possible sub-category as well.
